title: Sri Lanka women win 100m relay silver in India
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Women’s 100m relay team sprinted their way to silver at the 61st Indian Interstate Athletics Championship 2022 on Sunday (12), in Chennai.
The Sri Lankan team of Amasha de Silva, Shelinda Jansen, Medhani Jayamanne and Lakshika Sugandhi clocked 45.35 seconds to win silver in 100 relay event.
The Indian team cruised to Gold clocking of 43.95 second while the team from the Indian state of Kerala came in third.
Jaishankar to brief India’s MEA Consultative Committee on Sri Lanka crisis
